attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Abortion Should be banned for the under sixteens (unlees for medical reasons).
Children of this age are not able to make an informed decision or can be pressured by their parents.
If they don't wish to be young mums then they can adopt and give their children to familes who are not able to have children of their own.
This would also garantee that young women don't become infertile due to problems before or during the abortion.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
